title: Crime Alert 02.26.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 02.26.19
description:
Reality show Live PD catches a shooting death on camera when a Florida man shoots his neighbor. Was the check actor Jussie Smollett wrote to two brothers for helping him fake a hate crime attack or for a training regimen? R. Kelly’s arrest for aggravated sex abuse of underage victims shines a light on the star singer’s money problems.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
